info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 11:55AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Salt Lake...northwestern Utah and east central Tooele Counties through 1245 PM MDT... At 1155 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ophir, or 11 miles south of Tooele, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sandy, Murray, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Pleasant Grove, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, American Fork, Herriman, Eagle Mountain, Alpine, Bluffdale, Cedar Fort, Ophir and Camp Williams. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 278 and 299. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
